briefTitle: Safety and Tolerability and Efficacy of LCZ696 in Japanese Hypertensive Patients With Renal Dysfunction
officialTitle: A Multi-center, Open Label Study for Evaluation of the Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of 8-week Treatment With LCZ696 in Japanese Hypertensive Patients With Renal Dysfunction
summary: This study assessed the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of LCZ696 in hypertensive patients with renal dysfunction.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Reported Adverse Events (Total Adverse Events, Serious Adverse Events and Death)
